name: Holomon
blurb: Holomon is a LOCATION-BASED, hunt/battle game that offers donors the BEST KICKSTARTER REWARD EVER. Make a character!

rewards.reward: You get a big thanks from Tierra Games! Thank you for your contribution!

FULL ACCESS PASS Package:  When Holomon launches, you will have unlimited access to the whole game: all areas, maximum storage, a plentiful stash of calibrators (50), and a chest of 300 pieces of gold that can be used for Holomon trading or future upgrades - a $24.50 value!

FULL ACCESS + Exclusive Area Package:  In addition to the FULL ACCESS PASS, you'll receive access to the "Kickstarter Exclusive" area that will be closed off to everyone except Kickstarter.com contributors for the first 6 months after release!

Early Bird Make a Holomon - Bronze Package: You will be able to submit a character to be turned into an in-game, usable Holomon. You can send us a written description, an actual drawing, or photograph from which our artist will draw up your character. In addition, you will be able to pick the location that this character will be available. If you only want it available in your state, city, or even within a mile radius of your house, your wish is our command! Finally, you'll be able to characterize your Holomon; should it be a healer, a buffer, or a tank, or something else. We will take your recommendation into account and do our best to hold true to your vision. This package also includes the FULL ACCESS PASS, and access to the exclusive Kickstarter area

Make a Holomon - Bronze Package: \r\n\r\nSubmit a design of a Holomon, and we'll turn it into a Bronze Grade Holomon available in-game. Also includes FULL ACCESS PASS and access to exclusive Kickstarter area.
FULL ACCESS PASS + 2000 GOLD + EXCLUSIVE AREA + T-SHIRT: You receive the FULL ACCESS PASS, but with a stash of 2000 Gold instead of 300, and an exclusive Holomon T-shirt.

Early Bird Make a Holomon - Silver: Same as Silver Package, but cheaper! We hope that with these Early Bird packages, you will find yourself inclined to send out a mass text/email to friends/family who would be interested. :) Thanks in advance!\r\nThis package includes the FULL ACCESS PASS and access to the exclusive Kickstarter only area.

Make a Holomon - Silver Package: Same as Bronze package, but your Holomon will be Silver Grade, and therefore superior to Bronze characters. This package also includes FULL ACCESS PASS and access to the exclusive Kickstarter only area
Early Bird Make a Holomon - Gold Package: Everything from the Silver package, except your Holomon will be Gold Grade.
Make a Holomon - Silver + T-shirt Package: You get to make a Silver Grade Holomon, as well as a Holomon T-Shirt, a FULL ACCESS PASS, and access to the exclusive Kickstarter only area

Early Bird Make a Holomon - Diamond Package: That's right - we have an Early Bird package for the most sought after class of Holomon in the game. At a massively discounted price, you can have a Diamond Grade, top of the line Holomon. This package also includes the FULL ACCESS PASS and access to the Kickstarter.com exclusive area.

Make a Holomon - Gold Package: Now we're talking big time. Your Holomon will be classified among the most powerful. Only the rare, elusive Diamond Grade Holomon will be superior! Additionally, you'll receive the FULL ACCESS PASS, and access to the Kickstarter exclusive area
Early Bird Diamond Package with T-Shirt: Same as Early Bird Diamond Package, but you get the T-Shirt as well

Make a Holomon - Diamond Package: This is it. If you purchase this package, your Holomon will be a force to be reckoned with. Diamond Holomon are among the most rare. You will also receive the FULL ACCESS PASS and access to the Kickstarter exclusive area.

Make a Holomon - Ultimate Team Package: If you purchase the team package, you'll be able to literally create your own Holomon team. That's right - create five characters - 1 Diamond, 4 Gold. You will be able to crush your opponents with you customized team. This offer also includes the FULL ACCESS PASS and access to the exclusive Kickstarter.com area.
Caught Them All Package: We will deposit into your account each new Holomon as they become available in the game. You literally get all of them. You will be the ultimate master of Holomon
